title: Saudi Cabinet rejects Israeli land laws amid Founding Day 2026 prep
summary_full: Saudi Arabia's Cabinet met to prepare for the upcoming Founding Day celebrations. The nation expressed deep pride in its history and values. Ministers also strongly condemned Israeli land policies in the occupied West Bank. This stance aligns with broader Arab efforts for Palestinian rights and a peaceful resolution. The Kingdom continues its role in regional diplomacy and domestic development.
